resources.string: An error occurred with the camera
Your Locations Settings is set to \'Off\'.\nPlease Enable Location to use this app

Click on the map to have a wider view, the points of interest are represented by colored circles.

The side bar represents the considered visual distance, reduce it in case of lack of points of interest.
It is shown an approximate distance and the current direction.

The approximate address of your location is shown below, in case the address is missing, the location data (latitude, longitude and altitude) are shown.

Pointing the smartphone to a point of interest, it will be shown a colored tag with the name, the address and the approximate distance from that point.

In the upper left you can select a filter for the points of interest.
The available filters (for now) are : restaurants, bars, museums and gas stations. The active filter is slightly highlighted.

LookARound is able to open the positions shared by their contacts on social networks.\nOpening the application from a shared link containing a location will start the app in \"FriendMode\" showing only the shared positions as a point of interest.

Sometimes it is necessary to calibrate the sensors of the device to get a realistic experience.\nIf you find abnormal behavior of the app turn the device for a few seconds according to each of the main axes as shown in the figure.
